statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Rob Marberry and Garrison Mathews each pumped in 29 points to lead Lipscomb past South Carolina Upstate for a 92-80 win Monday night.
article.headline: Marberry, Garrison lead Lipscomb past SC Upstate 92-80
article.linkText: Marberry, Garrison lead Lipscomb past SC Upstate 92-80
article.story: SPARTANBURG, S.C. -- Rob Marberry and Garrison Mathews each pumped in 29 points to lead Lipscomb past South Carolina Upstate for a 92-80 win Monday night. Josh Williams added 11 points for Lipscomb (14-11, 6-2), which shot 52 percent from the field and took sole possession of second place in the Atlantic Sun Conference. Marberry's point total was a career high on 13-for-21 shooting and he also collected seven rebounds. Matthews was 9 for 18 from the field and 8 of 9 from the line. Lipscomb got a pair of free throws at the end of the first half to take a 41-39 advantage into the break. Early in the second half, Michael Buchanan put SC Upstate (15-10, 5-3) on top 53-52 before Lipscomb responded with a 9-0 spurt to take the lead for good. Buchanan's 20 points and 11 rebounds led five Upstate players in double figures.
